modName: Craftable Jagged-Crown and custom glass sword
summary: Adds a custom glass sword to the game and a craftable jagged crown (Light)
descriptionHtml: This is my first mod, made with Skyrim Creation Kit. Honestly, I watched a YouTube video on how to create custom weapons while making this haha... Anyway, after I was done with the sword I thought; "What the hell, lets make a craftable Jagged Crown!" which led to me posting this mod... The Jagged Crown is located in the Daedric section of armor because I was being lazy and looked up ArmorDaedricGauntlets in the filter, haha... The Glass sword is craftable, but later when I get better at modding, I will make a dungeon that the sword will go with, but at the moment it's just the sword and the jagged crown. You'll know what the swords name is when you go to craft it haha! It will swink 5x as fast as a normal sword! If you want to slow it down you can just change it in CK. Same with the Crown. in CK it's named "ArmorBoneCrown" so you can double click on that and change the crown back to heavy, but what terrible player uses heavy armor? ;) Now that I've wasted a few minutes of your life with the description, [color=#ff0000]GO DOWNLOAD YOUR DAMN MOD!!![/color]
author: MadBruh

files.name: Craftable jagged crown with custom sword
